SELECT tp.purchase_seq, tp.purchase_name, tp.purchase_status, tp.purchase_contract_date, tp.purchase_extended_price, tp.purchase_note, tu.user_name, tc.client_name FROM tb_purchase tp JOIN tb_user tu USING (user_seq) JOIN tb_purchase_order tpo USING (purchase_order_seq) JOIN tb_client tc ON (tpo.client_seq = tc.client_seq) WHERE tp.purchase_status != 'DELETE'
AND #{searchStartDate} <= tp.purchase_contract_date
AND #{searchEndDate} >= tp.purchase_contract_date
AND tc.client_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName}, '%')
AND tp.purchase_status IN
#{status}
ORDER BY tp.purchase_seq
LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT tpi.item_seq, tpi.purchase_item_quantity, tpi.purchase_item_price, tpi.purchase_item_receipt_date, tpi.purchase_item_status, tpi.purchase_item_note, ti.item_name, ti.item_image_url, tw.warehouse_name FROM tb_purchase_item tpi JOIN tb_item ti USING (item_seq) JOIN tb_warehouse tw ON (ti.warehouse_seq = tw.warehouse_seq) WHERE tpi.purchase_seq = #{purchaseSeq} ORDER BY tpi.purchase_item_seq

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_purchase tp JOIN tb_user tu USING (user_seq) JOIN tb_purchase_order tpo USING (purchase_order_seq) JOIN tb_client tc ON (tpo.client_seq = tc.client_seq) WHERE tp.purchase_status != 'DELETE'
AND #{searchStartDate} <= tp.purchase_contract_date
AND #{searchEndDate} >= tp.purchase_contract_date
AND tc.client_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName}, '%')
AND tp.purchase_status IN
#{status}

SELECT tp.purchase_name, tp.purchase_contract_date, tp.purchase_reg_date, tp.purchase_total_quantity, tp.purchase_extended_price, tp.purchase_note, DATE_FORMAT(tp.purchase_reg_date, '%Y-%m') as purchase_reg_month, IFNULL(SUM(tp.purchase_extended_price), 0) as purchase_month_price, IFNULL(SUM(tp.purchase_total_quantity), 0) as purchase_month_quantity FROM tb_purchase tp WHERE 1=1
AND #{searchStartDate} <= tp.purchase_reg_date
AND #{searchEndDate} >= tp.purchase_reg_date
AND tp.purchase_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchName}, '%')
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(tp.purchase_reg_date, '%Y-%m'), tp.purchase_reg_date WITH ROLLUP;
